body.name: ApoloSign StandMe 32-Inch Portable Smart Screen 1080p Rotatable Monitor with Incell Touch Screen, Android OS(Support Google Store), Built-in Battery(4-6H), Full Swivel Rotation, Voice Remote Control
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 26 mins
features: 🌟[LARGE TOUCH SCREEN FOR EXCELLENT VISUALS] The 32-inch LG in-cell touch screen features a 1920x1080 pixel resolution for an high-definition visual experience. Additionally, we provide an external 4K HD camera (vertical mode only) and a voice-activated remote control (not supported by all apps) for each mobile smart screen, allowing you to easily use and control the device.

📲[ACCESS TO VARIOUS APPS WITH GOOGLE PLAY STORE] The ApoloSign system is a custom Android-based operating system, and our rollable Android TV has received full Google certification, allowing you to effortlessly download and install any application available on the Google Play Store. With 8GB RAM and 128GB of internal storage, you can easily run all your favorite apps.

📺[ADJUSTABLE SCREEN FOR COMFORTABLE VIEWING] The screen can be adjusted by moving it up and down, rotating left and right, and tilting at different angles to provide a better viewing experience. This allows you to comfortably watch videos anywhere, whether you are sitting or lying down.

👣[MOVABLE DESIGN FOR ON-THE-GO USE] The smart screen comes with a removable charging dock and a built-in 108Wh battery that can last up to 6 hours, making it a mobile entertainment center. You can freely move it to different areas of your home whether it be your living room, dining room, kitchen, bedroom, or even outdoors, depending on where you are.

🖥️[WIRELESS & WIRED PROJECTION FOR EASY SHARING] Our mobile smart screen offers both wireless and wired screen casting options , giving you the flexibility to choose the best method for easily sharing your favorite content from your phone, tablet, or computer with those around you.

💁‍♀️[EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SUPPORT FOR A GREAT USER EXPERIENCE] We are committed to providing our customers with high-quality products and services. Our friendly after-sales support team is always ready to assist you in any way possible.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page FHD Incell Screen Immersive FHD touch display A large screen with a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels delivers a high-definition visual experience. Multiple Adjustments Customize the viewing angles Adjust the optimal viewing angle -- Rotation: 90˚ CW/CCW, Swivel: 30˚ L/R, Tilt: 25˚ F/B, Lift: 18cm Tailored Android OS Freedom to download apps Access a world of apps, discover and install your favorite apps on Google Play Store with ease. Unrestricted Movement Wireless design, move at will 6800mAh built-in battery powers 4-6h wireless use, 5 silent wheels for easy indoor/outdoor mobility. Next page 1 FHD Incell Screen 2 Multiple Adjustments 3 Tailored Android OS 4 Unrestricted Movement

A Mobile Entertainment Center The portable charging dock is equipped with a 98Wh built-in battery, allowing you to use it wirelessly for 4-6 hours. The bottom of the dock is equipped with 5 hidden silent wheels, making it easy to move to any room in the house or even outdoors. It's undoubtedly a mobile entertainment center.

Captivating Audio-Visual Experience ApoloSign StandMe‘s quartet of speakers delivers exceptional audio, immersing you in your favorite music and enhancing social gatherings with crystal-clear, immersive sound. With Bluetooth capability, effortlessly connect and enjoy a seamless wireless audio experience. Elevate Atmosphere with Ambient Soundscapes Enhance your surroundings with ApoloSign StandMe's ambient soundscapes. Choose from a variety of eight immersive environments, such as a cozy fireplace or calming ocean waves. Perfect for social gatherings or relaxing alone, these soundscapes create a rich atmosphere.

Seamlessly Share Your Favorite Content Our mobile smart screen offers both wireless and wired screen casting options , giving you the flexibility to choose the best method for easily sharing your favorite content from your phone, tablet, or computer with those around you. A Display Screen with Powerful Performance Equipped with an octa-core processor, 8GB of RAM and 128GB of storage, this display screen can smoothly run any applications you need. Not only can you connect it to your Switch for gaming, but it also serves as a great display screen for gaming.

Specification Sheet Screen Size 24“/ 32" Operation System Highly customized Android 12 OS CPU Octa core RAM 8GB Internal Memory 128GB Resolution 1920*1080 Touch Type In-cell touch, 10-Points Network Dual-band WiFi /Ethernet /Bluetooth 5.0 Camera External, 4K (Vertical top mount) Remote Control Voice remote control (Not come with batteries) Interfaces MIC IN、Earphone、LAN、USB 3.0、HDMI IN、Type-C Battery 14.4V/6800mAh, 4-6 hr Speaker Stereo speaker Microphone Standard dual Microphone Casting protocol Apple AirPlay、Miracast、Android DLNA Adjustment options 90° Rotating、±15° Turning、±20° Tilting、18cm Lifting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than I thought it could be!
reviews.reviewText: First off the packing materials could not have been better. It arrived in perfect condition. I was amazed at the speed of this 'tablet". I'm not an Android person but I find it very usable. Video, sound, construction all great.What I don't care for..Little paper booklet is uselessCamera can be mounted on the end or side of the screen, BUT it doesn't work on the side because you can't flip the picture... Seriously, a simple settings code in the camera app SHOULD be able to flip the image..It's not apparent to modify the 1st Home page. I'll have to surf the web to figure that out.All in all, I gave it 5 stars. so far...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy I decided to purchase this! I always wanted to watch tv in my room but had no space on the wall or in my room to put a tv. And this is exactly what I was looking for. You can just charge it and do not need to plug it in. I'm just obsessed with it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I think this is a great product, but a little pricey. There’re so many ways to use it. The fact that I can take it anywhere in the house like the kitchen for recipes and tv background noise while I cook is exciting! I also don’t have a tv in my bedroom so I can roll it in there or just tuck it in my closet if I don’t want it out.
